pullRequest.title: Move unsupported files notification into problems console #173
pullRequest.bodyText:
Move unsupported files notification into problems console instead of logging
Add unit tests for uncovered methods

nodes.bodyText: Do we need to add new TPSR for it?
Should be a part of eclipse IP already, but better double check.
Java 9 Map.of   can be used if we do not modify the map
From Guice docs: Avoid using field injection with final fields, which has weak semantics.
